item.description:
Hola a todos, tenemos una nueva Assistente Organizadora se llama Andrea, perdonen que no pude assistir las ultimas dos veces estube super ocupada. Nos vemos en Septiembre!!!

Gracias!
Ana Maria

Hola, como estan todos?
Our last meetup was great, Thanks to all for coming.
We had a great night of getting to know each other and an awesome spanish conversation, it was really interesting.
Hope to see you all next time!

group.name: The Worcester Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Worcester Spanish Language September Meetup
